unnormalised: Okay, so you're asking about finding official addresses in India, right? It can be tricky sometimes. Usually, the best place to start is the official website of the department or organization you're looking for. For example, if you're looking for the address of the Income Tax Department in Mumbai, you'd check incometax.gov.in and search for their contact information. Don't just rely on random Google searches, okay?
normalised: Okay, so you're asking about finding official addresses in India, right? It can be tricky sometimes. Usually, the best place to start is the official website of the department or organization you're looking for. For example, if you're looking for the address of the Income Tax Department in Mumbai, you'd check incometax dot gov dot in and search for their contact information. Don't just rely on random Google searches, okay?

unnormalised: Another thing to keep in mind is that addresses in India are often written with quite a bit of detail. You might see things like "CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi, 110003" or "4th Floor, MTNL Building, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050". Make sure you write everything down exactly as it's given, especially the PIN code. That PIN code is super important for the postman!
normalised: Another thing to keep in mind is that addresses in India are often written with quite a bit of detail. You might see things like "C-G-O Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and three" or "fourth Floor, M-T-N-L Building, Bandra (W), Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty". Make sure you write everything down exactly as it's given, especially the P-I-N code. That P-I-N code is super important for the postman!

unnormalised: Also, remember that govt. offices often have different branches or regional offices. The address for the head office might be different from the one for your local branch. For instance, the regional passport office in Chennai is at "Rayala Towers, 47 Whites Road, Royapettah, Chennai - 600014", but the address for the Delhi office will be totally different. Double-check you have the right one!
normalised: Also, remember that government offices often have different branches or regional offices. The address for the head office might be different from the one for your local branch. For instance, the regional passport office in Chennai is at "Rayala Towers, forty seven Whites Road, Royapettah, Chennai - six hundred thousand and fourteen", but the address for the Delhi office will be totally different. Double-check you have the right one!

unnormalised: Finally, if you're really stuck, you can try calling their helpline or visiting the nearest public information center. Sometimes they can help you find the address you need or even direct you to the right department. Good luck finding what you need!
normalised: Finally, if you're really stuck, you can try calling their helpline or visiting the nearest public information center. Sometimes they can help you find the address you need or even direct you to the right department. Good luck finding what you need!
